task.title: Eating arrangements
task.shortdesc: This will tell you how to get food on spring break

taskbody.context:
I will be sleeping and eating at home.
To find food:

step.cmd: First, check the refrigerator. My parents don't eat carbs anymore, so most of our food is in there.
If you are not satisfied with the options in the refrigerator, the pantry is available as well. Look to the right of the fridge and open the door.
Most of the snacks are on the second and third shelves. Take anything you want.
If you are looking for frozen meals or any type of meat, go into the garage and look in the deep freeze. Meat will be on the left hand side, and frozen meals will be on the right.
When you are finished, place all dishes in the dishwasher. If the dishwasher is full, put soap in the dispenser and hit start on the outside of the washer.
